name: @trustify-ui/common
description: ESM module for code common to client and server

scripts.prebuild: bun run clean && bun run generate-strings
scripts.generate-strings: bun --eval "import fs from 'fs'; import ejs from 'ejs'; const json = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('../branding/strings.json', 'utf8')); fs.writeFileSync('src/branding-strings.ts', ejs.render('export const strings = <%= JSON.stringify(json) %>; export default strings;', { json }))"
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap && mv dist/index.js dist/index.mjs && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format cjs --sourcemap && mv dist/index.js dist/index.cjs && bun run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: bun --eval "import fs from 'fs'; import { mkdirSync, cpSync } from 'fs'; mkdirSync('dist/branding', { recursive: true }); cpSync('../branding', 'dist/branding', { recursive: true })"
